prompts.name: troubleshoot-pod
prompts.description: Generate a troubleshooting guide for a pod

arguments.name: podName
arguments.description: Name of the pod to troubleshoot

prompts.name: explain-resource
prompts.description: Explain a Kubernetes resource in simple terms

arguments.name: resourceKind
arguments.description: Kind of resource to explain (e.g., Deployment, Service)

prompts.name: security-review
prompts.description: Generate security recommendations for a workload

arguments.name: workloadName
arguments.description: Name of the workload to review

prompts.name: optimize-resources
prompts.description: Suggest resource optimization for a deployment
